Name: Apparition
Behaviors: A faint, translucent form that flickers in and out of view. Its movements rarely follow natural patterns.

Name: Shadow Figure
Behaviors: A pitch-black humanoid outline that absorbs light around it. Witnesses report an overwhelming sense of dread.

Name: Poltergeist
Behaviors: Known for manipulating objects violently. Sudden loud knocks or crashes often accompany its presence.

Name: Spectral Wolf
Behaviors: A ghostly wolf that moves silently across terrain. Its eyes glow with an unnatural, icy luminance.

Name: Phantom Child
Behaviors: A small figure heard giggling or crying in distant halls. It often appears just out of the corner of ones eye.

Name: Unknown Entity
Behaviors: Its form defies classification, shifting unpredictably. Observers note intense unease when near it.

Name: Ectoplasmic Mass
Behaviors: A goo-like semi-transparent mass that quivers softly. It glides across surfaces as though searching for something.

Name: Bigfoot
Behaviors: A massive, hairy creature leaving enormous footprints. It emits deep grunts and disappears quickly into forests.

Name: Chupacabra
Behaviors: A spined creature that prowls at night. Reports describe glowing eyes and livestock found completely drained.

Name: Mothman
Behaviors: A winged humanoid with large reflective eyes. Sightings are often linked to impending disasters.

Name: Bloody Mary
Behaviors: Appears when summoned through mirrors. Witnesses report rapid, jarring movements and intense staring.

Name: Casper
Behaviors: A friendly, harmless spirit with gentle behavior. Frequently tries to communicate without causing fear.

Name: Witches
Behaviors: Practitioners of dark or mysterious arts. Strange chants and floating symbols often accompany their rituals.

Name: UFO
Behaviors: An unidentified airborne craft exhibiting impossible maneuvers. Emits a low hum before vanishing instantly.

Name: Alien
Behaviors: A non-human intelligent being with unknown motives. Displays advanced technology and unpredictable behaviors.

Name: SkinWalker
Behaviors: A shape-shifter that mimics voices and forms. Its transformations often include disturbing distortions.

Name: Devil
Behaviors: A powerful malevolent figure radiating oppressive heat. Its presence induces terror and hallucinations.
